title: Introducing: ODEO
body:
Wow.

This is absolutely stunning.

Tokyo based outfit **ODEO**, led by Julia and Yuma, have purposefully kept information relatively sparse. Their debut track, _White Crow_, is one of this years most beautiful and emotionally moving moments. Musically there’s elements of the heart-wrenching allure of Julien Baker, merged with the life affirming elegance of Sigur Ros or Nils Frahm, and when combined with the stunning video, makes for a truly hauntingly special first outing.

Musically there’s elements of the heart-wrenching allure of Julien Baker, merged with the life affirming elegance of Sigur Ros \[…\]
